title: Boring for water in South Africa
brief_description: An instructional film showing procedures in drilling water bores in arid areas of South Africa, from the geological survey to the setting up and operation of the drill rig. Includes drill-bit sharpening, operation and erection of a windmill to pump out water.
description: An instructional film showing procedures in drilling water bores in arid areas of South Africa, from the geological survey to the setting up and operation of the drill rig. Includes drill-bit sharpening, operation and erection of a windmill to pump out water.
